message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a one-time offer to you at a price of $1,300,000. This is a fair and competitive price, considering the product's value to you is $1,500,000. If you're interested, let me know, and we can discuss the details. If not, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to purchase it for $1,200,000.
